obtain_loran.title: Get your hands on Loran
obtain_loran.description: Loran is found in the End Island and can be extracted with a pickaxe.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great job! Now it`s tiem to get your hands on some Unsable Obsidian.

obtain_unstable_obsidian.title: Craft Unstable Obsidian
obtain_unstable_obsidian.description: Use the Loran combined with some Obsidian to craft Unstable Obsidian.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Now you can make a portal out of it, so craft some more to get the first leap towards The Abyss

obtain_abyss_portal_activator.title: Craft Abyss Portal Activator
obtain_abyss_portal_activator.description: Use the Loran to craft an Abyss Portal Activator. You guessed it, you can use it to lit the portal towards The Abyss

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great job! Now use with on the Unstable Obisidian to travel further.

travel_to_abyss.title: Travel to The Abyss
travel_to_abyss.description: Place the eyes into the portal frame and jump inside of it.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Welcome to the high sky! Make sure not to tip over the edges of these islands as there is just abyss downwards.

locate_abyss_arena_magician.title: Locate the Magician`s Arena
locate_abyss_arena_magician.description: Find the Magic Tower forked like a tree, home to the Magician.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: You`ve found the Magician`s domain. Prepare for battle.

defeat_abyss_arena_magician.title: Defeat the Magician
defeat_abyss_arena_magician.description: The Magician is a keen being that holds the Magic Core of the Abyss. Defeat it in its Magic Tower.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Well done defeating the Magician! Now claim the Magic Core.

obtain_magic_core.title: Obtain the Magic Core
obtain_magic_core.description: Collect the Magic Core dropped by the Magician.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: The Magic Core is in your possession. One step closer to the Eye of Abyss.

92combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 92
92combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 92.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

locate_abyss_arena_elder.title: Locate the Elder`s Arena
locate_abyss_arena_elder.description: Find the arena with tall stony pillars and a massive flat roof, domain of the Elder.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: You`ve located the Elder`s arena. Brace yourself for the fight.

defeat_abyss_arena_elder.title: Defeat the Elder
defeat_abyss_arena_elder.description: The Elder is a kangaroo-like prehistorical entity. Defeat it in its stony pillar arena.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Impressive victory over the Elder! Secure the Elder Eye.

obtain_elder_eye.title: Obtain the Elder Eye
obtain_elder_eye.description: Collect the Elder Eye dropped by the Elder.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: The Elder Eye is yours. Continue gathering the artifacts.

place_arcane_workbench.title: Get an Arcane Workbench
place_arcane_workbench.description: Make yourself an Arcane Workbench and put it on the ground. Very useful to make somnium constructs

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Amazing! It`s time to explore the vastness of recipies we could to with Somnium

get_tier_9_power_up.title: Get Yourself a Stronger Powerup 9
get_tier_9_power_up.description: Powerups are armor trim materials that enhance your gear with various stats. Type /powerups to find out more about it

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Apply those to your armor to become stronger!

94combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 94
94combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 94.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

locate_abyss_arena_abyssaur.title: Locate the Abyssaur`s Arena
locate_abyss_arena_abyssaur.description: Find the massive ring arena like a colosseum, lair of the Abyssaur.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: The Abyssaur`s colosseum is found. Prepare for a dizzying battle.

defeat_abyss_arena_abyssaur.title: Defeat the Abyssaur
defeat_abyss_arena_abyssaur.description: The Abyssaur is a prehistoric creature that causes dizziness. Slay it in the colosseum.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great triumph over the Abyssaur! Claim the Prehistoric Claw.

obtain_prehistoric_claw.title: Obtain the Prehistoric Claw
obtain_prehistoric_claw.description: Collect the Prehistoric Claw dropped by the Abyssaur.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: The Prehistoric Claw is secured. You`re making progress.

96combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 96
96combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 96.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

locate_abyss_arena_roka.title: Locate the Roka`s Arena
locate_abyss_arena_roka.description: Find the spot marked by X, where the Roka is held.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: X marks the Roka`s location. Get ready to face the bull.

defeat_abyss_arena_roka.title: Defeat the Roka
defeat_abyss_arena_roka.description: The Roka is a bull-like creature caught live. Defeat it at the X-marked spot.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Remarkable defeat of the Roka! Obtain the Roka Horn.

obtain_roka_horn.title: Obtain the Roka Horn
obtain_roka_horn.description: Collect the Roka Horn dropped by the Roka.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: The Roka Horn is yours. Almost all pieces are gathered.

98combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 98
98combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 98.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

locate_abyss_arena_crystal_golem.title: Locate the Crystal Golem`s Arena
locate_abyss_arena_crystal_golem.description: Find the massive glass sphere, guardian post of the Crystal Golem.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: The glass sphere is located. Face the Crystal Golem with caution.

defeat_abyss_arena_crystal_golem.title: Defeat the Crystal Golem
defeat_abyss_arena_crystal_golem.description: The Crystal Golem is made of rose quartz. Defeat it in the glass sphere.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Astounding victory! Now collect the Crystal Hand.

obtain_crystal_hand.title: Obtain the Crystal Hand
obtain_crystal_hand.description: Collect the Crystal Hand dropped by the Crystal Golem.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: The Crystal Hand is obtained. All artifacts are ready for crafting.

obtain_eye_of_abyss.title: Craft the Eye of Abyss
obtain_eye_of_abyss.description: Combine the Magic Core, Elder Eye, Prehistoric Claw, Roka Horn, and Crystal Hand to craft the Eye of Abyss, a relic of immense power.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Incredible! The Eye of Abyss is complete. Its power will guide you further.

get_tier_10_power_up.title: Get Yourself a Stronger Powerup 10
get_tier_10_power_up.description: Powerups are armor trim materials that enhance your gear with various stats. Type /powerups to find out more about it

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Apply those to your armor to become stronger!

100combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 100
100combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 100.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

defeat_nightblade_boss.title: Defeat the Nightblade Boss
defeat_nightblade_boss.description: Use the Eye of Abyss on the Night Altar with all Brick Stone pillars lit to summon and defeat the Nightblade Boss.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Incredible! The Nightblade Boss has fallen. The Abyss grows silent.
